title.rendered: Dreaming of a Better Nose? Plastic Surgery in NYC

content.rendered:
So much depends upon our nose. Plastic surgery provides the opportunity to improve both the form and function of your face’s most prominent feature. At Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery, Dr. Steven  J. Pearlman and team are committed to providing top tier rhinoplasty surgery for patients looking to repair, correct, or reform their nose.

Rhinoplasty 101

If you’re looking for “nose plastic surgery” there’s a 99.9% you’re considering some sort of rhinoplasty procedure. Rhinoplasty surgery is a catch all for any (almost) any plastic surgery procedure that involves changing the size and shape of the nose or its features. 

The exception to this rule being for a septoplasty, which is exclusively referring to correcting a deviated septum and the associated breathing issues. However, septoplasties can combine with cosmetic adjustments in a septorhinoplasty.

What can nose plastic surgery fix?

  • Nasal hump
  • Drooping nasal tip
  • wide or overly large nose bridge
  • crooked or asymmetrical nose
  • deviated septum
  • upturned tip
  • collapsed bridge (scooped nose)
  • Deviated septum
  • And more!

Sitting down with a rhinoplasty specialist for an in-depth consultation is the best way to learn how plastic surgery can address your unique desires for your nose.

Dr. Pearlman specializes in multiple types of rhinoplasty, including preservation, ethnic, and the ultrasonic piezo rhinoplasty. He has also worked with the most difficult revision rhinoplasty surgeries. Colleagues who perform primary rhinoplasty often send him revision rhinoplasty patients for complex nasal surgery

Because it’s a surgical procedure, there is some downtime required afterwards. However, when performed by expert hands, recovering from a rhinoplasty doesn’t have to be a deterrence when considering plastic surgery.

Breathe easier with nose plastic surgery in NYC at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery.

Dr. Steven J. Pearlman is a dual-board certified facial plastic and reconstructive surgeon.  During his career,  he’s performed over 7,500 rhinoplasties. His meticulous attention to detail and precision result in less bruising and a quicker recovery period for the patients at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery.

The goal isn’t for you to look like a completely different person or “plastic” after your rhinoplasty. Dr. Pearlman works with you, using Mirror 2D and Vectra 3D imaging during your consultation, to develop a rhinoplasty plan that will result in a subtly elevated and naturally gorgeous version of yourself.

Schedule your consultation to get started.

Not quite ready for an in-person visit? You can use our rhinoplasty planning tool to learn more about our nose plastic surgery offerings. We also offer virtual consultations. 

 

Virtual Rhinoplasty Consultation
